name: Board Tennis
description:
Instructions: 

You just need the mouse to play. Click on the dice on your side of the court to roll the dice and then move to the quadrant you like. Whether or not you can strike back depends on the even and odd numbers printed on the quadrant that you are standing on. Wait for the CPU to play and strike again! You can find more details in the Help button inside the game.

A serve: you must use both dices, if the result is 12 you got an ace and if you got an 11 is out. The rest of the numbers works normal.

The game finish when you win a Set, you need over 40 points and you lose if you cant reach this goal. If you got a deuce(40-40) you will need over an advantage to win.

Developers: 

Juan Adasme: Progamming and Music 

Daniel RL (@danpanzerkunst_art IG): Pixel Art

In memory of Manuel Adasme, who gave the initial idea.
